Sentencas: Three series of glasses, BaO-CaO-SiO2-Al2O3, SrO-SiO2-Al2O3 and SrO-CaO-SiO2-Al2O3 were prepared.
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The coefficients of thermal expansion (CTE) of as-cast glasses were measured using dilatometer from room temperature to their glass transition.
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: A new method Average Field Strength Method was developed to accurately calculate the CTEs of all glasses and compared with traditional method (Appen method).
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Through comparison between calculated results and experimental results, the relation between the average field strength and the average field strength coefficient was found.
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: With the increase of average field strength, the CTE of glasses calculated by the Average Field Strength Method of glass decreases smoothly.
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The CTEF were very close to the experimental results.
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The errors between them were smaller than 3%.
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The error between the CTE of glasses calculated by traditional method and the experimental CTE was near 40%.
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The average Field Strength Method can be used to accurately calculate the CTE, and estimate the change trends of CTE.
Titulo: Theoretical calculations of the thermal expansion coefficient of glass-ceramic sealing materials in solid oxide electrolysis cell
